level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: The provisions of [D.C. Law 8-4 or 8-26] § 22 [codified in § 47-2501] shall apply as of July 1, 1986. All other sections of this act shall apply as of March 1, 1989.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 25 of Toll Telecommunications Service Tax Temporary Act of 1989 (D.C. Law 8-4, May 23, 1989, law notification 36 DCR 4154).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-26
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-26, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3901.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "Section 22" is § 22 of D.C. Law 8-26, which is codified at § 47-2501.
"This act," referred to in this section, is D.C. Law 8-26, which is primarily codified as § 47-3901 et seq.
